title: GCF of Terms
text: Find the greatest common factor of all the terms of the polynomial.

title: Multiply Common Factors
text: Multiply the terms shared by both expressions. $$GCF=5$$

title: Write each Term as a Product using GCF
text: Rewrite $$5a$$ and 5 as products of their GCF, 5. $$5a+5$$ $$5a+5\times1$$

title: Reverse Distributive Property
text: Use the reverse Distributive Property to factor the expression. $$5\left(a+1\right)$$
